column6: Afriland First Bank provides banking products and services. The company primarily serves large businesses, small businesses, micro-enterprises, and professionals. It operates approximately 30 branches in 10 regions of Cameroon, as well as offices internationally. Afriland First Bank was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Yaounde, Cameroon.

Henan Ruimei Hair Products Co. Ltd. manufactures and distributes hair products. The Company produces women's hair wigs, men's hair wigs, knitted hair curtains, and other products. The firm was founded in 1992 and is based in Xuchang, China.
column27: Cosmetics, perfume, personal care & household products

column6: Nigeria-based Dangote Group, a business conglomerate, engages in the cement, sugar, salt, pasta, beverages and real estate businesses in Africa. Its activities include manufacturing and importing cement, manufacturing and refining sugar, refining salt, milling flour and semolina, port services and haulage. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria.
